content: the ribbed-knit look on this classic infinity scarf is extremely easy to pull off thanks to a slight variation on basic crochet stitches made from a simple rectangle and seamed into a cozy loop this pattern is unisex very beginner-friendly and endlessly wearable experienced crocheters will be able to whip up this cowl in about 3-3 5 hours newer crocheters might take a bit longer but will find satisfaction in finishing this useful and on-trend accessory this ad-free printable pdf includes a written pattern and photo tutorial the photos are separate from the pattern so you can choose to print them or conserve ink this pattern originally appeared on make and do crew find all our free modern crochet scarf patterns many of which contain video tutorials here 1 1 https //makeanddocrew com/tag/scarf/
